definition[0]: different from what is normal or expected, especially in a way that you disapprove of or cannot understand
example[0]: It was an odd thing to say.
example[3]: There was something odd about him.
example[4]: What she did was unforgivable, but the odd thing was he didn’t seem to mind.
example[5]: She was holding an extremely odd-looking weapon.
example[6]: It seemed odd that he wanted a picture of me.
example[7]: Any odd scrap of paper will do.
definition[2]: separated from a pair or set
